website_summaries.verdict: Between its detergent-like scent, bold hues, and 3D printing versatility, there is a lot to appreciate about this eco-friendly resin.
pros: Available in many bright and vivid colors
Excellent for printing models, toys, and industrial prototypes
cons: Some colors are more readily available than others

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with the quality!
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve owned and used the Anycubic Photon S since April and made hundreds of prints with it using the regular resin. Traditionally UV resin has a lot of odor and is very toxic. I can’t speak to the chemical nature of this new eco resin, but it is far superior in terms of air quality. The test prints I did were perfect with no decreeable flaws whatsoever. This resin seems fantastic all be it a little pricier than the regular and limited for now to a very bright pastel color selection. I’m quite happy all together though, and will certainly buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: I wish all resin was like this
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really has almost no smell at all. Every brand of resin I have tried before (including Anycubic) has had a terrible smell from the moment I pour it in. This stuff almost has a sweet, natural smell to it. It prints really well too. Because it is opaque, it needs somewhat longer curing. I rinse and cure it just like any other resin, but without the headache.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has become one of my favorite resins to use when the weather is cold as the resin isn’t super thick and flows well regardless of temperature. My only complaints are the price and the fact it settles or separates quickly and needs to be stirred between prints. Lives up to its claim of low odor, but even better when combined with a filter mod for the Photon. The translucent resins are great for models you plan to paint as you can hold it up to a light and see where you’ve missed the primer but are harder to make out the details on otherwise. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jumperj101

customer_reviews.title: ANYCUBIC Plant-Based Resin Is Easy on the Nose, and great for Eyes and too!
customer_reviews.text: After my followup purchase of ANYCUBIC Low Odor and Safety, 405nm UV Plant-Based Rapid Resin, IT was easy to notice the reduced fumes/smell while printing, washing, curing, and post cure/handling. I was also VERY pleased with the models that I was able to produce. To me there is an observable difference from my use of other resins, and the excellent finish, hardness, and resolution obtained from my ANYCUBIC Photon printer with this resin, surpassed my initial assumptions regarding resins in general from the safety, use, and model quality obtained!
customer_reviews.author: Xajuar

customer_reviews.title: Has me sold on resin printing
customer_reviews.text: Virtually odor free, eco-friendly and biodegradable, and each print cleans beautifully with dish soap before final UV light curing. Incredibly good to work with. An update on this review after almost 2 months of use (as of January 8, 2020): every day I am more and more pleased with both my Anycubic Photon and the Anycubic ECO UV Resin -- the machine prints consistently time and time again, and the resin is amazing. Non-toxic, earth friendly, virtually odor free -- it captures astonishing detail and continues to impress me with every print, and the cleanup prior to UV curing with just dish soap makes the entire process a breeze. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Randall K. Stamm

customer_reviews.title: Is not crystal like in photo.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is low odor and eco friendly! I'm happy with the print quality, but have not much experience for comparison. Not crystal like in the photo, but has a yellowish tinge to it after curing. This is very disappointing when looking for a clear plastic and paying this much. I have now tested it with Rit all purpose dye (overnight soak) but colors do shift due to that yellowish tinge in the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: DaveW

customer_reviews.title: For those who are easily irritated by UV resins read on.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use many UV resin’s such as iFun and Elegoo. Of all the UV resin’s I’ve used this one was the one that irritated me the least. The quality is superb. I never had a print failure with this resin. The other resins I’ve used always irritated my throat and lungs. This resin gave me little to no irritation whatsoever. Do keep in mind though safety is first. Always use a respirator and gloves when handling these type of resins. No matter how safe they are marketed to be. The only downside to buying this resin is the price. I hope that in the future they will have lower prices.
customer_reviews.author: Nazareno Montagnese

customer_reviews.title: Terrific resin with no smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific resin to use. There was no smell, and the print time was relatively fast compared to another brand I’ve tried. The uncured model has some flex, which made support removal very easy. The resin is very easy to shake and pour, and had very little bubbles in it when I filled the vat. I will definitely add this to my list of favorite resins to use.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an office hobbyist
customer_reviews.text: So my first concern with this resin was if the adjustments made would hinder print quality, and i can say that has been put to rest. This performs just as well as traditional anycubic or elegoo resin, and if anything cleanup is a bit easier, as I find the supports easier to remove. The reduced odor is ideal for someone who has their machine in a workspace or area they frequently inhabit. The only reason I do not give this product 5 stars is the price makes it prohibitive for use in volume, and at the time of this review it is not available in grey. It is however a fantastic resin!
customer_reviews.author: sirilee lopez

customer_reviews.title: More durable resin
customer_reviews.text: I print minatures with an Anycubic Photon, but the regular resin is so brittle that a strong breeze snaps things off (ok that's a little hyperbolic...but not much). This is more durable and the supports seem to break off more easily under hot water. Less stinky too.
customer_reviews.author: SorchaCB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing resin, way better than any other i've tested
customer_reviews.text: Amazing with the Quidi Tech 5.5 S, and a thousand times better than any resin by Elagoo. The smell is nearly non existant. The best results i've had with prints is 80s first layers exposure and then 8s normal exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Gaugler

customer_reviews.title: It has low oder as described
customer_reviews.text: It has low oder as described. The prints are coming out good. It has some flexibility in it when not fully cured which is nice to get the supports off. I like it much better than the longer stuff that came with my printer.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Low oder keeps our workspace fume free
customer_reviews.text: The alcohol I use to clean up smells worse than the resin, which I can barely detect. Always a good idea to have lots of ventilation no matter what. Still requires a liberal amount of alcohol to clean up. It comes out of the printer nice and solid even without our UV lamp. We got the clear resin, as we are planning on painting the pieces, although we haven't tried that as of yet so don't know how it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color!
customer_reviews.text: This color is awesome. Perfect for Halloween too! I will say, I'm very impressed with the eco vs regular. The fumes seemed to be significantly lower. I still used it in a well ventilated area but could actually notice a difference. This performance is just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: WakenBacon

customer_reviews.title: Low odor, easy print, smooth details.
customer_reviews.text: I used the recommended settings from the Anycubic site. print came out great. Cleaning wasn't as difficult as other resins I've used. The photos are prior to curing. Great detail and the color made it easy to see contrast in the print.
customer_reviews.author: battman

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality and low odor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality resin. I run a printing business and with the amount of printers i have i was looking to reduce the odor in my shop. You can barely smell anything at all with this resin and the detail it captures is just as good as their other resins.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: First resin printer, first time working with Anycubic resin.
customer_reviews.text: For never having used any resin printer before, the Photon S + Anycubic Resin really made it easy. The resin printed nicely, and wasn't too difficult when cleaning up small drips. I don't have experience with other resins for comparison yet, but with the first print coming out perfect using the Anycubic resin, it's definitely setting a high standard!
customer_reviews.author: Ian V

customer_reviews.title: Low odor, nice prints
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful prints, very low odor. My only complain is the price and color select, but hopefully those will improve as this product is developed.
customer_reviews.author: nytshad

customer_reviews.title: Great project, unique colors, very low odor.
customer_reviews.text: Great resin, with the quality you would expect from AnyCubic. Very low odor, cures just as well as traditional resin.
customer_reviews.author: R.P.M,

customer_reviews.title: Great results with this resin and it's eco friendly. Minimum odor
customer_reviews.text: Great product and clean prints. Minimum to no odor. Way more comfortable to work with this resin than others
customer_reviews.author: EmE Creative LaB

customer_reviews.title: A nice resin with many benefits
customer_reviews.text: I like the AnyCubic plant resin because has lower odor and because it is plant-based. I feel like it is a better choice for the environment as a whole and for my household environment.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Less toxic smells while keeping the same print quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice printing resin. I was shocked how much less of a smell there was with the new plant based formula compared to the standard resin. This resin is a must have if you're printing in a small home or apartment without modifying your machine for extra ventilation. The prints made with this resin have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Prints, Much better smelling
customer_reviews.text: Even being more costly, these Soy based resins are definitely better smelling. You still get the same crisp detail in your prints. They also have a larger UV range, so they are usable for many other resin printers, not just your ANYCUBIC PHOTON.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Much less odor than any other resin I've used (odors tend to be what triggers migraines for me, so this is a big plus), also less viscous so letting the excess drip off doesn't take nearly as long. I've not noticed any decrease in detail whatsoever and it seems to be at least as rigid as anything else. Overall easy and more pleasant to work with. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great resin, not great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this resin! I just feel like it’s not worth double the price of normal resin. Print quality Is great.
customer_reviews.author: jake perry

customer_reviews.title: Good resin, but not crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: This resin world pretty well and it's strong, but it cures with a yellowish tint to it. It's definitely not crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but still use common safety precautions.
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed using the Eco Resin and will continue to do so in the future. It works well with high detail. It certainly has a less severe odor than the standard resin, but is still detectable. So, be sure to use in well ventilated area and use other standard safety equipment when handling/disposing of this product.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL DETAIL!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this resin, strong and very translucent. I noticed that if you sand and add clear coat, it can be transparent as glass! Low smell but will burn fast if gets on your skin. Other than that, great resin, will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Tony A.

customer_reviews.title: Run a frequency test, will be diffeent than most.
customer_reviews.text: such a nice color. Perfect for all your baby yoda needs. It is less smelly than most others but still don't dab any under your neck for the night out.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very low odor, A little yellowing, I did some sanding N used rustoleum. Came out very nice n clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost no smell
customer_reviews.text: I’ve printed several models with this. The odor is barely there. Smells a little like a dry erase marker but super faint. I’ve had my printer sitting on my kitchen table and printing constantly for over a week now.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Tekka

customer_reviews.title: Great resin!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff! Easy to dial in and pretty sturdy. I got good details, little brittleness and the smell wasn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Stan W

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, my favorite resin to use in my Anycubic Photon S printer. Others I have tried do not give the crisp detail that this transluscent green can achieve. Once I use up my remaining grey's, this will be the only resin I ever use again. It's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bio resin
customer_reviews.text: So far no bad prints with this resin. Details come out great with with stock settings on my Elegoo Mars. There is almost zero smell and it is easy to work with!
customer_reviews.author: jlumpe

customer_reviews.title: Very low odor and prints great
customer_reviews.text: Little to no odor, print is smooth and the color is beautiful. Highly recommend the Eco Friendly Violet Macaron
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cessna

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Resin
customer_reviews.text: I like this resin due to its print quality and low odor. I would definitely reorder it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Maker 3D Printing

customer_reviews.title: Fast prints and easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Prints very well, nice and sturdy stuff with low (6s) exposure times. The smell is probably not as subtle as everyone would like, but it cleans up VERY easily and gives me no headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Manrow

customer_reviews.title: Low odor, but more expensive
customer_reviews.text: The low odor part is a huge plus, it took some tries to get the settings right for a smooth print. For an indoor setup with limited ventilation, its worth the extra money and time
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Amberger

customer_reviews.title: One of the best resins in the market - cost benefit. Odorless
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality of print, great colors and the best part: Close to odorless. Excellent for printing during lockdown.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Virtually no smell!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to believe that this would be low odor having used other AnyCubic resins that have quite the strong smell. I was pleasantly surprised and the print turned out great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hellweg

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This resin has a better smell than the older resin I first got. It works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina Fitzhugh

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, works great
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems. Printed whatever I sent at it. The resin barely smells like anything now.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic resin
customer_reviews.text: Amazing print quality. Hardly any smell and good flexibility for resin. It's now my go to resin. I also love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Veldkamp

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This resin smells much better and is non-toxic I just wish it was a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Evans

customer_reviews.title: A different type of resin.
customer_reviews.text: Resin worked for its needs, no issues seemed to pop up. Durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the non-eco resin and feels less dangerous
customer_reviews.author: jconw

product_meta.title: ANYCUBIC 3D Printer Resin with Low Odor and Safety, 405nm UV Plant-Based Rapid Resin with High Precision and Quick Curing for LCD 3D Printing - 500ML Yellow
feature_bullets: Safer and ultralow odor : Made from soybean oil, truly eco-friendly. No VOCs, no BPA, no harmful chemicals.Complied with EN 71-3:2013 safety standard.

Easy to Use & Stunning Colors ：high precision and quick curing for LCD 3d printing and high quality pigments provide stunning colors in our range of resins and available colors (pink, blue, green, vilolet, orange, yellow)
Fast curing & Exposure Time: Optimized curing time for Anycubic Photon, offering better printing quality. Bottom layer exposure: 50-60s; Normal exposure: 8-10s
Wide compatibility: Sensitive to 355nm~405nm UV light. Compatible with most LCD/DLP 3D printers.

Attention & Storage : When printing large model, please increase the build plate contact of the model or lower the infill density to avoid wrapping. Store in a dry and dust-free place under 15℃-35℃ and keep it sealed and keep it away from sunlight.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
